bookBuilder.title: Ho kenya BookBuilder

upload.title: Kenya litokomane tsa hao
upload.dragDrop: Hula u behe faele ya ZIP mona
upload.supportedFormats: E amohelehile: Lifaele tsa ZIP tse nang le litokomane tsa Word (.docx)

import.title: Ho kenya ho phethiloe
import.success: Buka ya hao e kentswe hantle!

messages.importTip: üìù Keletso ya ho Kenya: Haeba ditokomane tsa hao tsa Word di na le dikahare tse tsoakaneng (dihlooho, tafole ya dikahare, tlhahisoleseding ya mongodi, joalo-joalo), BookBuilder e ka theha dikarolo tse ding. Ka mora ho kenya, o ka hlakola dikarolo tseo o sa di batleng habonolo mme o fetise dikahare pakeng tsa Ntho ya Pele, Ntho e Kholo, le Ntho ya ho Qetella ha ho hlokahala.
messages.systemPages: Leqephe la Sehlooho le Tokelo ya Mongodi di etsoa ka bo tsona - leqephe lefe kapa lefe la sehlooho/tokelo ya mongodi le kentseng le tloheliloe.
messages.languageNote: Ditokomane di tla aroloa ka ho sebedisa mekhoa ya puo ya {{language}}.
messages.noContent: Ha ho dikarolo tsa dikahare tse fumaneng - ka kopo hlahloba faele ya hao ya ZIP.
messages.duplicateSections: Mabitso a dikarolo a tshwanang a fumanwe: {{sections}}
messages.processingError: Phoso ho sebetsana le faele ya ZIP. Ka kopo hlahloba sebopeho sa faele mme o leke hape.
messages.emptyZip: Faele ya ZIP e bonala e se na letho kapa ha e na ditokomane tse tshehetsiwang.
messages.invalidFormat: Sebopeho sa faele se sa nepahalang. Ka kopo kenya faele ya ZIP e nang le ditokomane tsa Word.

classification.title: Hlahloba Karollo ya Ditokomane
classification.subtitle: Hula dikarolo pakeng tsa mefuta ho hlophisa sebopeho sa buka ya hao
classification.frontMatterDesc: Leqephe la sehlooho, ditokelo tsa mongodi, ho nehelana, mantsoe a qaleho, lenane la ditaba
classification.mainMatterDesc: Dikgaolo, ditaba tse kholo, thepa ea motheo
classification.backMatterDesc: Qetello, mantsoe a qetello, tlatsetso, bukantswe ea mantsoe, lenane, ditshupo

validation.noFile: Ka kopo khetha faele ya ZIP ya ho kenya.
validation.invalidFile: Ka kopo khetha faele ya ZIP e nepahetseng.
validation.noDocuments: Ha ho ditokomane tsa Word tse fumanoeng
validation.processingFailed: Ho sebetsana le ditokomane ho hloleha
validation.selectFile: Ka kopo khetha faele ya ZIP
validation.selectValidFile: Ka kopo khetha faele ya ZIP e nepahetseng

bookBuilder.dragToReorder: Hula dikarolo ho hlophisa hape ka har'a mefuta kapa sebedisa "FETISA" dropdown ho fetola dikarolo pakeng tsa Ntho ya Pele/e Kholo/ya ho Qetella
